price: 罪犯们将看见火狱，他们已料想到自己必堕其中，无处逃避。
arabic: وَرَءَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ ٱلنَّارَ فَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ عَنۡهَا مَصۡرِفٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waraā al-muj'rimūna al-nāra faẓannū annahum muwāqiʿūhā walam yajidū ʿanhā maṣrifan
